Class javachart.chart.Regress

Class javachart.chart.Regress 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Line
           |
           +----javachart.chart.Regress
public class Regress
extends Line
Subclasses Line to provide OLS regression. Markers are drawn at the original data points, while the regression line is calculated to minimize the squared differences from the resulting line.

Regress(Dataset[], AxisInterface, AxisInterface, Plotarea)
Constructs a Regress component from the specified Dataset array, scaled by the specified X and Y axes, and drawn within the bounds of the specified Plotarea.

doLine(Graphics, int)
Overrides Line to draw regression lines instead of conventional plot lines.

Regress 
  public Regress(Dataset d[],
                 AxisInterface xAx,
                 AxisInterface yAx,
                 Plotarea subplot)
Constructs a Regress component from the specified Dataset array, scaled by the specified X and Y axes, and drawn within the bounds of the specified Plotarea.
Parameters:
d - Array of Dataset classes to consider
xAx - X Axis scaling this data
yAx - Y Axis scaling this data
subplot - Plotarea bounding this regression line

doLine 
  protected void doLine(Graphics g,
                        int whichSet)
Overrides Line to draw regression lines instead of conventional plot lines.
Parameters:
g - Graphics to draw
whichSet - index in Dataset array to draw
Overrides:
doLine in class Line
